text: James Richardson Comer Jr. ( ; born August 19, 1972) is an American politician. He is the U.S. Representative for 1st congressional district since 2016. He is a member of the Republican Party. Before, he was in the Kentucky House of Representatives and also was the agriculture commissioner of Kentucky. ==References== ==Other websites== *Congressman James Comer official U.S. House website *Campaign site * Category:1972 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Kentucky Category:Politicians from Tennessee Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: James Comer
